item.title: Heating automation - laptop
item.description: Intro Python Intro The raspberry pi turned out not be a very reliable piece of hardware with pretty unreliable usb-connections. So I’ve decided to use my old laptop to run the home assistant system. Since it’s a i386 processor, I had to find a decent linux distribution that is relatively light on resources (RAM, CPU) and doesn’t need days of tinkering to set it up.
